annotation:
(a) 5 - I tend to keep my thoughts to myself, so I don't talk a lot.
(b) 2 - I'm agreeable, so I don't tend to focus on others' weak points.
(c) 1 - I'm not very conscientious, so I don't always do things carefully and completely.
(d) 5 - I’m neurotic, so I can be sad and depressed.
(e) 1 - I'm closed to experience, so I don't usually come up with new ideas.
(f) 5 - As an introvert, I definitely keep my thoughts to myself.
(g) 5 - I'm agreeable, I try to be helpful and not selfish.
(h) 5 - Being unconscientious, I can be quite careless.
(i) 1 - As a neurotic, I don't handle stress well and am not usually relaxed.
(j) 1 - Being closed to experience, I'm not usually curious about many different things.
(k) 1 - I don't have a lot of energy.
(l) 2 - I'm agreeable, so I don't start arguments often.
(m) 2 - I'm not very conscientious, so I may not be seen as a good, hard worker.
(n) 5 - I can be tense and not always easy going.
(o) 3 - I can be clever and think a lot.
(p) 1 - I don't usually make things exciting.
(q) 5 - I'm agreeable and tend to forgive easily.
(r) 5 - I'm not very organized due to my lack of conscientiousness.
(s) 5 - I worry a lot, due to my neuroticism.
(t) 1 - I'm closed to experience, so I don't have a very active imagination.
(u) 5 - I'm introverted, so I tend to be quiet.
(v) 4 - I'm agreeable, so I usually trust people.
(w) 5 - I can be quite lazy.
(x) 1 - I can get upset easily, as I'm neurotic.
(y) 1 - Being closed to experience, I'm not usually creative or inventive.
(z) 2 - I try to have a strong personality, but it's not always easy.
(aa) 3 - I can be cold and distant, but not always.
(ab) 1 - I don't always keep working until things are done.
(ac) 5 - I can be moody, due to my neuroticism.
(ad) 1 - I'm closed to experience, so I don't like artistic and creative experiences.
(ae) 5 - I'm kind of shy.
(af) 5 - I'm kind and considerate to almost everyone.
(ag) 1 - I don't do things quickly and carefully.
(ah) 1 - I don't stay calm in difficult situations.
(ai) 5 - I like work that is the same every time.
(aj) 1 - I'm not outgoing and don't like to be with people.
(ak) 2 - I'm not usually rude to others.
(al) 1 - I don't usually make plans and stick to them.
(am) 5 - I get nervous easily.
(an) 1 - I don't like to think and play with ideas.
(ao) 5 - I don't like artistic things.
(ap) 5 - I like to cooperate and go along with others.
(aq) 5 - I have trouble paying attention.
(ar) 1 - I don't know a lot about art, music and books.
